mapper.select: SELECT mall_pro_no, mall_pro_name, mall_pro_price, mall_pro_cate, mall_pro_img FROM mall_pro WHERE mall_pro_no = #{mallProNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coo_visitor (coo_visitor_no, mall_pro_no, coo_visitor_date, coo_visitor_time, coo_visitor_check) VALUES (#{mallVistorNo}, '01', DATE(NOW()), TIME(NOW()), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT mall_pro.mall_pro_name ,mall_sale.mall_sale_amount ,mall_sale.mall_sale_total ,mall_sale.mall_sale_date FROM mall_sale JOIN mall_pro ON mall_pro.mall_pro_no=mall_sale.mall_pro_no ORDER BY mall_sale.mall_sale_date DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT mall_sale.user_id ,mall_pro.mall_pro_name ,mall_sale.mall_sale_amount ,mall_sale.mall_sale_total ,mall_sale.mall_sale_date FROM mall_sale JOIN mall_pro ON mall_pro.mall_pro_no=mall_sale.mall_pro_no WHERE mall_sale.user_id=#{userId}
SELECT coo_visitor_date, count(coo_visitor_no) FROM coo_visitor GROUP BY coo_visitor_date

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`coo_visitor_date`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`coo_visitor_date`)-1) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as start, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`coo_visitor_date`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`coo_visitor_date`)-7) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as end, DATE_FORMAT(`coo_visitor_date`, '%Y%U') as 'date', count(coo_visitor_no) FROM coo_visitor GROUP BY date;
select month(coo_visitor_date) as 'month', count(coo_visitor_no) from coo_visitor group by month
